data.title: News: @InRealLife signs with Johnny Wright
data.meta_description: In Real Life, the boy band that was created on this summer's hit ABC reality show, "Boy Band," has signed with management and it's a familiar name - Johnny Wright. According to Variety, the group has signed with Wright's Wright Entertainment Group (WEG), which has lead Justin Timberlake's solo career and had a hit with…
data.text:
In Real Life, the boy band that was created on this summer’s hit ABC reality show, “Boy Band,” has signed with management and it’s a familiar name – Johnny Wright.

According to Variety, the group has signed with Wright’s Wright Entertainment Group (WEG), which has lead Justin Timberlake’s solo career and had a hit with the Jonas Brothers several years ago before the brothers split.

Wright has worked with many artists in his time – New Kids on the Block, Backstreet Boys, NSync and the new Menudo. His current roster also includes Incubus, Before You Exit, Akon, Lance Bass and interestingly enough, AJ McLean of the Backstreet Boys.
